title: The Hidden curriculum: assumptions
creator_credit: Janet Isaac, Bruce Moir and Film Australia
brief_description: This short film revfeals some of the effects of sex role stereotyping and is intended to trigger group discussion. Children of different age groups ranging from kindergarten to senior secondary students refveal their attitudes to girls, mothers and the female role. Parents have higher career expectations of their sons than of their daughters. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
